input.sentences: we went to a show girls convention .
the people from vegas thought they were the best .
i knew we would beat everyone .
because we had galinda the good witch on our side .
the skimpy outfits might have had us beat though .
output.sentences: It was the first annual girls convention.
The people of Vegas were very supportive of the event.
Everyone that came enjoyed the beat of the live music.
Even the good witch Galinda came to the convention.
Galinda was amazed by all of the skimpy outfits people were wearing.
